pullRequest.title: cache max size metrics
pullRequest.bodyText:
Issue #: #296
Description of changes:  Adding code change for collecting cache max size metrics for Field Data and Shard Request Cache.
sqlite> select * from Cache_MaxSize;
Field Data Cache|26214400.0|26214400.0|26214400.0|26214400.0
Shard Request Cache|80181985.0|80181985.0|80181985.0|80181985.0
sqlite>

Older PR : #270
By submitting this pull request, I confirm that my contribution is made under the terms of the Apache 2.0 license.

commit.message: Adding maxSize metrics for FieldData and Shard Request Cache
Adding the metric setup for new cache max size metric
Adding maxSize metrics for FieldData and Shard Request Cache

commit.message: Updating the Metric Name from .name() to .toString()
Adding constants for cacheType and removing unused metric declarations
